name: Insert Historical Data
query:
INSERT INTO historical_data
(date, temperature, label)
VALUES (TO_TIMESTAMP($1,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), $2, $3)
;

name: Insert Online Data
query:
INSERT INTO online_data
(date, temperature, label)
VALUES (TO_TIMESTAMP($1,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), $2, $3)
;

name: test historical data
Insert Online Data
query:
INSERT INTO online_data
(date, temperature, label)
VALUES (TO_TIMESTAMP($1,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), $2, $3)

name: SELECT * from online_data
query:
SELECT * FROM online_data
WHERE "date" >= TO_TIMESTAMP($1,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - INTERVAL '1 week';
